item.title: American Airlines launches major award sale for AAdvantage members
item.description: American Airlines launched a million-seat sale with award tickets starting at just 7,500 miles one-way for domestic trips and 17,500 for international...

item.title: Get Apple TV+ and Apple Music with your Chase Sapphire Reserve
item.description: Chase Sapphire Reserve cardholders get complimentary Apple TV+ and Apple Music subscriptions. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Last-minute strategies to earn Marriott Bonvoy elite status
item.description: By opening a credit card or booking a cash or award stay, you can earn Marriott elite qualifying nights by the end of the year to enjoy status in 2026...

item.title: The best credit cards for a diversified reward strategy
item.description: Consider these options from one of TPG's credit card editors.

item.title: Say it ain't so: Air Canada Aeroplan points will now expire (again)
item.description: Aeroplan had paused points expiration during the coronavirus pandemic, but says it will again be allowing points to expire.
